definition: to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
kjvTranslation: abide, apply, attain, [idiom] be, befall, [phrase] besiege, bring (forth, in, into, to pass), call, carry, [idiom] certainly, (cause, let, thing for) to come (against, in, out, upon, to pass), depart, [idiom] doubtless again, [phrase] eat, [phrase] employ, (cause to) enter (in, into, -tering, -trance, -try), be fallen, fetch, [phrase] follow, get, give, go (down, in, to war), grant, [phrase] have, [idiom] indeed, (in-) vade, lead, lift (up), mention, pull in, put, resort, run (down), send, set, [idiom] (well) stricken (in age), [idiom] surely, take (in), way.

translations.bg: да отида или да дойда (в широк спектър от приложения)
translations.cs: jít nebo přijít (v mnoha různých aplikacích)
translations.da: at gå eller komme (i en lang række anvendelser)
translations.de: gehen oder kommen (in einer Vielzahl von Anwendungen)
translations.el: να πηγαίνω ή να έρχομαι (σε μια ευρεία ποικιλία εφαρμογών)
translations.es: ir o venir (en una amplia variedad de aplicaciones)
translations.fr: aller ou venir (dans une grande variété d'applications)
translations.id: untuk pergi atau datang (dalam berbagai macam aplikasi)
translations.it: andare o venire (in un'ampia gamma di applicazioni)
translations.nb: å gå eller komme (i en lang rekke bruksområder)
translations.nl: gaan of komen (in een groot aantal toepassingen)
translations.pl: iść lub przyjść (w wielu różnych zastosowaniach)
translations.pt: ir ou vir (numa grande variedade de aplicações)
translations.ro: a merge sau a veni (într-o mare varietate de aplicații)
translations.ru: идти или приходить (в самых разных сферах)
translations.sv: att gå eller komma (i en mängd olika tillämpningar)
translations.uk: їхати або приїжджати (в широкому спектрі застосувань)
